Detailed Description

Skib blon information.

Contains information related to skin blobs

int CSkinBlobInfo::DetectaPixelsRangoColor ( IplImage *  h,
IplImage **  r_n,
IplImage **  g_n 
) [inline]

Detects pixels within a color range.

Given an input image detects thos pixels within a color range defined by RNmin, RNmax, GNmin and GNmax

Parameters:
h Input image
r_n Output image containing red normalized values
g_n Output image containing red normalized values

int CSkinBlobInfo::DetectaPixelsRangoColorenVentana ( IplImage *  h,
IplImage **  blobs,
IplImage **  blobs_noDil,
IplImage **  r_n,
IplImage **  g_n,
double  thal,
double  thau,
double  thbl,
double  thbu,
int  x1,
int  y1,
int  sx,
int  sy 
) [inline]

Detects pixels within a color range in a given window.

Given an input image detects returns a blob image where white pixels are within a color range defined by RNmin, RNmax, GNmin and GNmax

Parameters:
h Input image
blobs Output image containing blobs
blobs_noDil Output image containing blobs without dilation
r_n Output image containing red normalized values
g_n Output image containing red normalized values
thal Lower value for first color component
thau Higher value for first color component
thbl Lower value for second color component
thbu Higher value for second color component
x1 Upper left x coordinate
y1 Upper left y coordinate
sx Window width
sy Window height
